channel.title: CVE Feed for ghostscript -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ghostscript -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-10216|2024-08-04T22:17:18.936Z -- ghostscript -- ghostscript
item.description: In ghostscript before version 9.50, the .buildfont1 procedure did not properly secure its privileged calls, enabling scripts to bypass `-dSAFER` restrictions. An attacker could abuse this flaw by creating a specially crafted PostScript file that could escalate privileges and access files outside of restricted areas.
